OrgName: KidKraft, Inc. f/k/a/ KidKraft, LP with all it entities
activities: KidKraft collects data such as customer name, residential address, email address, account number, telephone and contents of the order. The data is collected at the time of the order. KidKraft will use the data to process the customers order, ship the order and invoice the customer.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All data is collected automatically and offline.  This includes Organization data, Client data, Customer data and Visitor Data
